articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Embassy in Lima 
   Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Lima received floral baskets from officials of political parties and organizations of Peru on July 7 and 8 on the occasion of the 12th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
 Among them were Alberto Moreno, chairman of the New Left Movement of Peru, Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, the chairman of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for the Free Vote Union, Yuri Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, and Tani Baler Lopera, chairman of the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea.
